Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Mystery and the Human Meteor's Debut
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and sets the stage for an underwater adventure, starting with a mysterious scene involving divers and hinting at a larger threat.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Underwater Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the underwater setting and introduces the Human Meteor alongside divers in distress, creating initial intrigue and setting up the central conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: From Taxi Driver to G-Man Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions from the initial underwater scene to a city setting, introducing Duke as a taxi driver and his unexpected involvement in a G-Man chase, linking seemingly disparate plot threads.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Duke's taxi ride with wealthy men and the emerging suspicion of being followed by a G-Man, building suspense and connecting Duke to potential intrigue.

sub_scenes.title: Pier Arrival and Human Meteor's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the taxi ride at the pier and escalates the G-Man pursuit, revealing the Human Meteor's involvement and setting up his active role in the unfolding events.

Major_Arcs.title: Cop Shooters and Hospital Espionage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Human Meteor's confrontation with 'cop shooters' and transitions to a hospital setting where a new plot thread involving a yacht and submarine is introduced, broadening the narrative scope.

sub_scenes.title: Confronting the Cop Shooters
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor's direct confrontation with the 'cop shooters', quickly resolving the immediate chase and showcasing his abilities.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Revelation and Yacht Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a hospital where a doctor reveals suspicions about a yacht and Japanese submarine, setting up a new espionage plotline for Human Meteor to investigate.

sub_scenes.title: Planning Yacht Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Duke and Toby planning to infiltrate the suspicious yacht, outlining a strategy for Toby to stow away and gather information.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby Infiltrates the Yacht and is Spotted

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Trap and Submarine Intel
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Toby's infiltration of the yacht, the discovery of a trap, and the confirmation of a Japanese submarine's presence, culminating in vital intelligence gathering.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck and Cabin Deception
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the scene on the yacht deck and inside a cabin, where Toby (as Pete) is observed and lured into a trap, increasing suspense.

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Sighting and Report
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Toby surviving the trap, identifying the submarine, and successfully reporting his findings to a naval officer, achieving his mission objective.

Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Submarine Assault
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Human Meteor's response to Toby's intel, his discovery of the sunken submarine, and his direct attack on the submarine and its crew.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Arrival and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor rushing to the scene, spotting the yacht, and discovering the sunken Japanese submarine, confirming the intelligence and setting up his intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Responds to the Call

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Battle and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the underwater confrontation between Human Meteor and divers, escalating into a physical fight and leading to Human Meteor utilizing a torpedo to attack the submarine and ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Identify and Target Human Meteor
Human Meteor Responds to Divers' Aggression
Diver's Threat and Human Meteor's Retaliation Hint
Spear Gun Attack and Cry for Help
Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Submarine
Human Meteor's Finishing Blow to Ship

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Domestic Interlude
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Human Meteor's pursuit of the yacht, the discovery of Peter's death, the search for the depth map, and concludes with a brief domestic scene.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Pursuit and Peter's Demise
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor pursuing the yacht and the discovery of Peter's dead body on deck, adding a layer of mystery to the yacht situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Death on Yacht

sub_scenes.title: Depth Map Search and Peter's Treachery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Human Meteor's search for the depth map in Peter's cabin and reveals the officers' suspicion of Peter's treachery, clarifying the motive behind the yacht investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Searches for Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Domestic Calm
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a brief respite, showing Human Meteor visiting Holden in the hospital and transitioning to a domestic scene with Toby and Duke, offering a moment of normalcy.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Car Ride and Domestic Scene with Toby and Duke

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline with the Liberty Lads confronting Nazis and a separate mystery unfolding with an ambulance arrival and dropped wallet, branching the narrative.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads in a direct confrontation with Nazis, setting up an action-oriented patriotic plotline.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Dropped Wallet
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts focus to two boys, Skip and Chuck, witnessing an ambulance arrival and discovering a dropped wallet, initiating a separate mystery plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Revealed

Major_Arcs.title: Garage Interrogation and Bronson's Danger
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Skip and Chuck's investigation of the wallet, leading them to a garage where they are intercepted, held captive, and encounter the menacing Mr. Horst and Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Garage Interception and Waiting for Horst
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Skip and Chuck's arrival at the garage, their interception by an officer, and the suspenseful wait for Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Garage and Interception

sub_scenes.title: Mr. Horst's Menace and Overheard Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the menacing Mr. Horst, his interrogation of the boys, and the revelation of a carbon monoxide murder plot overheard by his associates.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Agreement on Carbon Monoxide Plan

Major_Arcs.title: Garage Chaos and Major Bronson's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the chaotic events in the garage, including fighting, threats, and the unexpected intervention of Major Bronson's lawyer, leading to a shift in power and the eventual rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Garage Fight and Bronson's Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the eruption of fighting in the garage, the boys being overpowered, and Major Bronson directly threatening them, escalating the immediate danger.

sub_scenes.title: Lawyer's Betrayal and Marine Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features the unexpected violence of Major Bronson's lawyer, leading to Horst's men turning against Bronson and setting the stage for the Marine rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Seek Help and Sergeant Encounter
Urgent News and Car Crash at Barracks
Immediate Aid and Call for Ambulance

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ's South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new story with 'The Champ' and Henry in South America, caught in an intrigue involving Rosita's kidnapping and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to The Champ's Predicament
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in a South American town, setting up their unexpected involvement in a local conflict and hinting at a larger conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting

sub_scenes.title: Military Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the military interrogation of 'The Champ' and Henry, revealing the central conflict involves Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre and suspicions falling on the Americans.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plan and Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to El Tigre's perspective, revealing his demands and showing his men forcefully kidnapping 'The Champ' and Henry, directly involving them in his scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Carjacking
The Forced Drive and Destination Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene highlights 'Mama's' mistaken belief that the kidnapped Americans are rescuers and sets up a parallel infiltration plan to rescue Rosita from El Tigre's hideout.

Major_Arcs.title: El Tigre's Hideout Confrontation and Rosita's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, the search for Rosita, and the eventual rescue operation amidst internal conflicts and external threats.

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Intrigue and Rough-House Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows internal conflicts within El Tigre's group, the search for Rosita, and the initiation of a 'rough-house' plan to interrogate for her location.

narrative_arcs.title: Claim of Identity Theft by Axis Agents

sub_scenes.title: Internal Conflict and Rescue Mission Initiation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts further internal disagreements regarding El Tigre, the arrival of news about Rosita's location, and the immediate launch of a rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Rosita Held by Axis Agents, Rescue Plan

sub_scenes.title: Citadel Escape, Hotel Infiltration, and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the pursuit and confrontation with enemies, strategic planning for infiltration, gymnastic infiltration tactics, and finally the successful rescue of Rosita amidst ongoing combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape to Citadel and Hotel Strategy

sub_scenes.title: Climax and Resolution of Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Rosita rescue storyline with final confrontations, threats, the maid's brave intervention, and the arrival of government troops, culminating in gratitude and recognition.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, focusing on his disobedience, possession of vital plans, and his engagement in a new mission against Axis forces.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Jungle Combat and Insubordination
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes Devil Dog Dolan's jungle combat skills and introduces his insubordination, setting up a conflict between duty and personal mission.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle River Journey and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a river journey through the jungle, escalating from perceived danger to a direct native ambush, placing a new character in immediate peril.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle River Journey and Perceived Danger

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Capture and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's capture, interrogation by Grauer, and the threat of torture to obtain the sub detector plans, highlighting the stakes of his mission.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arson and Native Attack Justification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dolan continuing his sabotage through arson, justified by strategic motives and leading to a planned attack on native huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Marines' Onslaught and Grauer's Strategic Talk
Grauer's Dismissal and Native Hut Burning

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Camp Attack and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan attacking a native camp, the accidental death of the chief, and the subsequent native submission, leading to a surprising alliance.

Major_Arcs.title: Ship Surrender, Father-Son Conflict, and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the confusing orders to surrender, the confrontation between the captain and his son (Dolan/Sam), a shipboard fight, and the eventual rescinding of the surrender order.

sub_scenes.title: Surrender Orders and Father's Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the confusing orders to surrender the ship and the captain's internal conflict regarding his 'father's duty'.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigate the Banker's Murder
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the 'Twinkle Twins' and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, starting with a briefing and leading to a hospital visit and initial suspicions.

sub_scenes.title: Newsroom Briefing and Police Station Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'Twinkle Twins' story and depicts their briefing at the newspaper office, followed by their inquiry at the police station, initiating their investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Blood Type Clue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dan and Diane's hospital visit to Miss Reilly, revealing her illness and the crucial clue about blood transfusion incompatibility, pointing towards Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

Major_Arcs.title: Reilly Chase, Mob Justice, and Hospital Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the pursuit of Tom Reilly, the chaotic events in the Irish neighborhood including mob justice and police intervention, culminating in Tom Reilly's recovery due to community blood donation and the apprehension of Farnacci.

sub_scenes.title: Reilly Encounter and Taxi Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dan and Diane's search for Tom Reilly, their encounter with Mrs. Murphy, and the initiation of a chase after Tom Reilly flees.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly and Initial Encounter
Conversation with Mrs. Murphy about Farnacci
Arrival and Chase of Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Blockade, Mob Violence, and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the escalating chaos in the Irish neighborhood, including a human blockade, vigilante action, mob violence, and the eventual intervention of the police to restore order.

narrative_arcs.title: Rushed to Ambulance and Onward Concern

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Drama and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene is set in the hospital, depicting the anxious wait for news, the urgent need for a blood transfusion, the community's response to donate blood, and the resolution of Tom Reilly's medical crisis.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion News
Community Rushes to Donate and Hospital Anxiety
Blood Type Confirmation, Transfusion Preparation, and Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Justice for Lassie Reilly and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the 'Twinkle Twins' story with the pursuit and apprehension of Farnacci, a brief interlude about forced blood donation, and a joyous birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly, resolving the murder case and bringing a happy ending.

narrative_arcs.title: Threats and Determination to Capture Farnacci
Police Respond and Arrest the Murderer

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's New Jungle Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc continues Devil Dog Dolan's story in the jungle, now focusing on a new mission beyond the previous conflict, with a 'skunk chase' hinting at further adventures.

sub_scenes.title: New Jungle Mission Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up a new mission for Devil Dog Dolan in the jungle, indicated by the 'skunk chase' mentioned by the native allies, transitioning to a fresh narrative direction.
